name: klaro
description: A simple but powerful consent manager.

scripts.make-dev: cross-env APP_ENV=dev cross-env APP_DEV_MODE=server webpack-dev-server --config webpack.config.js --history-api-fallback
scripts.make-dev-no-css: cross-env SEPARATE_CSS=1 APP_ENV=dev cross-env APP_DEV_MODE=server webpack-dev-server --config webpack.config.js --history-api-fallback
scripts.make-watch: cross-env APP_ENV=dev cross-env APP_DEV_MODE=watch webpack --watch --config webpack.config.js
scripts.make: cross-env APP_ENV=production cross-env APP_VERSION=$(git tag --points-at HEAD) cross-env APP_COMMIT=$(git rev-parse HEAD) webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.make-no-css: cross-env SEPARATE_CSS=1 APP_ENV=production cross-env APP_VERSION=$(git tag --points-at HEAD) cross-env APP_COMMIT=$(git rev-parse HEAD) webpack --config webpack.config.js

author: KIProtect GmbH
